rows.label: tev013401_SEL0011
rows.name: Ask Matthew for his thoughts on the Ma-non.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev013401_MSG0001
rows.name:
My wife, Alesa, has a boutique in the commercial
district. Apparently she even gets Ma-non customers
coming in sometimes.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev013401_MSG0002
rows.name:
Unfortunately, she gets a little uneasy around xenos.
Or anyone who looks strange, actually.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev013401_MSG0003
rows.name:
Lately, she's been dreading even opening her shop.
Is it really all that bad?[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev013401_MSG0004
rows.name:
I mean, the Ma-non pretty much do whatever you want
so long as there's a pizza involved, right?[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev013401_MSG0005
rows.name:
Although free pizza might just make them visit even
more, now that I think about it...[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev013401_MSG0008
rows.name:
I've gotten pretty used to dealing with Aganeba.
If it looks like he's going to gripe about something,
I just order him a pizza.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev013401_MSG0009
rows.name:
At this point, I just need to pull out my comm device
and open the delivery menu to get him to do as I ask.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev013401_MSG0010
rows.name:
So long as I provide pizza, I don't even need to pay
him. It's so convenient![ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev013401_MSG0020
rows.name:
I just heard from Alesa that you helped resolve her
issue with Ma-non customers.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev013401_MSG0021
rows.name:
I don't think her fear will ever go away completely,
but her attitude toward the Ma-non is much better.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev013401_MSG0022
rows.name: I've been too busy with work to discuss it with her.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev013401_MSG0023
rows.name:
But when I see her face after I get home,
she looks a lot less stressed than she used to.
And that's certainly a load off my mind![ST:wait ]
